scripts.build: turbo run build:clean; turbo run build
scripts.build:gallery: turbo run build:clean; turbo run build:gallery
scripts.build:laboratory: turbo run build:clean; turbo run build:laboratory
scripts.build:examples: turbo run build:clean; turbo run build:examples
scripts.clean: rm -rf `find . -type d -name node_modules -o -name dist -o -name .next -o -name out`; rm package-lock.json
scripts.pre-publish: turbo lint typecheck prettier test; npm run new-version; npm install
scripts.publish:latest: npm run build; lerna exec -- npm publish --no-private --access public --tag latest
scripts.publish:alpha: npm run build; lerna exec -- npm publish --no-private --access public --tag alpha
scripts.publish:beta: npm run build; lerna exec -- npm publish --no-private --access public --tag beta
scripts.publish:canary: npm run build; lerna exec -- npm publish --no-private --access public --tag canary
